SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Publisher
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Game.Game
public class Game extends Publisher
This class represents a game session. Players, Decks and the Table can be accessed and managed through the class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numPlayers, String gameName) throws IOException
      Constructs a new game session with the specified number of players. Initializes decks, cards on table, players and other variables.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players in the game.
      gameName - the game name
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an I/O error while reading card files.

    • Game

      public Game(int numPlayers, String gameName, long randomSeed) throws IOException
      This constructor is called directly for testing, removing randomness by fixing the seed of the rng
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players in the game.
      gameName - the game name
      randomSeed - the random seed used to shuffle card and to select first player
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an I/O error while reading card files.

    • getPlayableCardFromCode

      public Optional<PlayableCard> getPlayableCardFromCode(String code)
      The method retrieves a playable card from the deck based on its code. Each card code is composed of two parts: the type of the card and the card number.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the playable card, if found.

    • getGoalCardFromCode

      public Optional<GoalCard> getGoalCardFromCode(String code)
      The method retrieves a goal card from the goal card hashmap given its code.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the goal card, if found.

    • getInfoCard

      public String getInfoCard(String code)
      The method retrieves the description of a card based on its unique code. The description consist of a String.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The description of the card, if the card is found, otherwise an error message.

    • getInfoAllCards

      public ArrayList<String> getInfoAllCards()
      The method retrieves the descriptions of all cards from the four decks. For each deck and for each card the getCardDescription is called.
      Returns:
      List of Strings with the card descriptions.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      The method starts the game session. It sets the first player and the current active player.

    • getFirstPlayer

      Get active player that is currently playing.
      Returns:

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Get next player.
      Returns:
      The next player in sequence. The turns are made based on the player indices in the ArrayList players.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      NameAlreadyInUseException - if the name is already in use.

    • getPlayerByName

      public Player getPlayerByName(String name) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      The method retrieves a player given its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The unique name of the player.
      Returns:
      The player class associated with the specified name.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if no player with the given name is found.

    • getDeckFromType

      public Deck<PlayableCard> getDeckFromType(PlayableCardType type) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Get deck of specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the deck, only RESOURCE or GOLD allowed
      Returns:
      the deck
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the type is not RESOURCE or GOLD

    • pickCardFromDeck

      public PlayableCard pickCardFromDeck(PlayableCardType type) throws EmptyDeckException, IllegalArgumentException
      This method returns a card from the deck of specified type. If the deck is empty, throws an exception
      Parameters:
      type - The type of card to pick from the respective deck
      Returns:
      The card from a specified deck
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException - when the deck is empty, return this exception
      IllegalArgumentException - if the type is not RESOURCE or GOLD

    • pickCardFromTable

      public PlayableCard pickCardFromTable(PlayableCardType type, int position) throws CardNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException
      This method returns a card of the given type at the given position. The card is removed from the position, and if no card is present the exception NoCardException is thrown. Then a card from the same deck type is drawn (if the deck is not empty) and placed at the given position.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of card to pick, either RESOURCE or GOLD
      position - The position 0 -> left 1 -> right
      Returns:
      The card in the specified position if present
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - when there is no card, this exception is thrown
      IllegalArgumentException - if the type is not RESOURCE or GOLD

    • updateGoalPoints

      public void updateGoalPoints()
      Update goal points. Public goals and private goal are used.

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Get number of players.
      Returns:
      the number of players to play this game, as specified by the player when the game was created.
